name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Fry bacon. 3. Mix eggs and cheese. 4. Combine all ingredients. 5. Season with pepper.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: 1. Cut chicken and vegetables. 2. Heat oil in a pan. 3. Stir fry chicken. 4. Add vegetables. 5. Season with soy sauce.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Combine in a bowl. 3. Add crumbled feta. 4. Drizzle with olive oil. 5. Sprinkle oregano.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Saut√© onions. 3. Add other vegetables and broth. 4. Simmer until vegetables are tender. 5. Season with herbs.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Cream butter and sugar. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Mix in flour. 4. Fold in chocolate chips. 5. Bake until golden brown.
